pkgmetadata.longdescription: Elitist Non-Dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm // Box- constrained multiobjective optimization using the elitist non- dominated sorting genetic algorithm - NSGA-II. Fast non- dominated sorting, crowding distance, tournament selection, simulated binary crossover, and polynomial mutation are called in the main program. The methods are described in Deb et al. (2002) doi:10.1109/4235.996017.
